author: quintonm
msg: Applied patch TTWS53 submitted by Age Mooy.

The attached patch for TurbineAvalonComponentService allows your Avalon components to define their own logger category in the config file. At the moment all components get the same "org.apache.turbine.services" logger and all your component logging ends up in the Turbine log file.
With this simple patch, everything stays the same for components that don't specify a logger. But if you have something like this in your
DefaultComponentFactory) creates a logger for the specified category and the log messages will show up in any log file you want to configure in your Log4j.properties.
